member.summary: Gets or sets if ResponsiveNavigation will take the whole width of the screen.

member.summary: Gets or sets the template items that will be aligned to left.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.ResponsiveNavigation.LeftAlignedItemsTemplate

member.summary: Gets or sets the value binding that points to a property which will be navigated to when the item is clicked.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value binding that points to a property indicating whether the item is selected or not.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value binding that points to a property indicating whether the item is disabled or not.

member.summary: Gets or sets a binding which defines a click action for button items.

member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of items that is used when no DataSource is set.

member.summary: Performs the data-binding and builds the controls inside the .

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.Container.NumberOfColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of columns in the Bootstrap column system. The default value is 12. Change this property if you are using a customized version of Bootstrap with different number of columns.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.SelectedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected date in picker.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.InitialDate
member.summary: Gets or sets date which will be selected after open picker if isn't selected some date. Default initialDate is now, but you can specify some date.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.FormatString
member.summary: Gets or sets FormatString whitch format see user in view. Format can be specify as ISO-8601 (yyy-mm-dd, yyyy-mm-dd hh:ii, yyyy-mm-dd hh:ii:ss ), or combination of p, P, h, hh, i, ii, s, ss, d, dd, m, mm, M, MM, yy, yyyy.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.WeekStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the day which will be first in picker, you can use enum (Sunday, Monday, ..., Saturday).

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.CultureName
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture name wich localization picker. Default is culture which use for your application.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.ShowTodayButton
member.summary: Gets or sets the button which show today date. Default this button is hidden.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.HighlightToday
member.summary: Gets or sets highlight today date. Default this hightlight isn't.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.AutoClose
member.summary: Gets or sets auto close picker after select date. Default this feature is off.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets Mode for you picker, (Date, Time, Datetime). Default Mode is DateTime.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.MinuteStep
member.summary: Gets or sets minute step. Default value is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.DaysOfWeekDisabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the days which cannot be selected in the picker. Either use comma-separated numbers of days (0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday, ..., 6 = Saturday), or bind this property to an int[] array.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.MinDate
member.summary: Gets or sets MinDate which is minimum date on your picker.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.MaxDate
member.summary: Gets or sets MinDate which is maximum date on your picker.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.ShowMeridian
member.summary: Gets or sets ShowMeridian for show AM and PM time view.

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.TextBoxCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets TextBoxCssClass for setting class for your textbox in picker. Default is form-control

member.name: P:DotVVM.Framework.Controls.Bootstrap.DateTimePicker.PickerPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets PickerPosition. Default value is BottomRight. Other value which you can set is BottomLeft
